# onaudioprocess | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ WebKit JS ](/documentation/webkitjs)

-  onaudioprocess 

Instance Property# onaudioprocess

Safari Desktop 10.0+Safari Mobile 10.0+

```
attribute EventHandler onaudioprocess;
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/webkitjs/scriptprocessornode/1628880-onaudioprocess#discussion)

This attribute uses [`AudioContext`](/documentation/webkitjs/audionode/1631014-audiocontext), so you need to trigger this handler with a touch event.
